main event: A bright white object, size of a basketball, was reported hovering at treetop level before moving down and disappearing behind clouds on July 27, 1958.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 1 minute., It was described as being steady and brilliant in appearance., The sighting occurred at treetop level., There was no physical evidence available to support the sighting., The weather conditions at the time were overcast with light drizzle.
witness description: Airdrome officer who called the tower operator's attention to the object.
